bayes_network.cpd

Class Split

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes_network.cpd.Split

  • public class Split
extends java.lang.Object
    Splits all instances along a specific attribute.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstien - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Field Detail

      • branches

        private java.util.ArrayList<SplitBranch> branches
        All of the branches for this split. For splits on nominal attributes, there will be one branch per nominal value. For continuous attributes, there will be two branches. One branch for the all instances with a value greater than the threshold and one branch for all instances less than or equal to the threshold value.

      • attribute

        private data.attribute.Attribute attribute
        The attribute this Split splits instances on

      • splitInstances

        public void splitInstances(data.instance.InstanceSet instances)
        Split a set of instances along this split's attribute. Each split is stored in one of this Split's SplitBranch objects
        Parameters:
        instances - the set of instances we wish to split

      • getSplitBranches

        public java.util.ArrayList<SplitBranch> getSplitBranches()
        Returns:
        all of this split's branches
